title: Why Version Control, Hosting & Security Matter
description: Understanding the importance of version control, hosting, and security in web development

blocks.content: 1.3 為何需要版本控制、Hosting、安全性 (Why Version Control, Hosting & Security Matter)
Learn why these three concepts are essential for professional web development.
Track changes, collaborate with others, and maintain a history of your code.
Make your website accessible to users around the world.
Protect your application and users from threats and vulnerabilities.
